attributes.action: Change allowable drink driving level to zero tolerance.
attributes.additional_details: A zero tolerance on drinking and driving levels would hopefully change people's behaviour reducing the risks on our roads. As well as giving the police a better foothold on the fight against drunk drivers.
attributes.background: The idea that people are allowed to consume any alcohol and get behind the wheel is terrifying in itself and people always take advantage of this and consume more then the recommended allowance and still get behind the wheel claiming to be ok and they arn' t which then results in accidents.
